entry.title: $2670 // Luxury Building - Doorman. 1 bedroom Open House by appointment.
entry.content:
Prime Prospect Heights/Crown Heights location. One block from Brooklyn Museum!

This gorgeous 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom home with a large living room in prime Prospect Heights/Crown Heights is waiting to be yours.

Located two blocks from the 2, 3, 4 and 5 subway lines this home is just a 25-minute train ride into Manhattan. Crown Heights is an epicenter of Brooklyn's diverse cultural influences, right outside of your front door you will have access to some of the best restaurants Brooklyn has to offer, as well as Prospect Park, the Prospect Park Zoo, the Brooklyn Museum, and the Brooklyn Botanical Garden.

Designed by world-renowned architect Karl Fischer, this distinguished home features wide plank hardwood flooring, southern exposures that flood the space with natural light, a king-sized bedrooms, a beautifully appointed bathroom complete with marble finishes and luxurious soaker tub, in-unit laundry, and a kitchen equipped with top of the line Blomberg appliances.

Situated in a brand new full service building, you will have access to amenities such as:

* Landscaped rooftop terrace with grilling areas, lounge areas, putting green, chess board, and a stunning
view of the New York City skyline
* Media/screening room
* Business lounge
* Separate conference room/library
* Private party room
* Private building garden
* Pet spa
* State-of-the-art health and fitness center
* Locker rooms
* Yoga room
* Children's play room
* Storage units
* Recording studio
* Two large bike rooms

So the sky is truly the limit when it comes to making this home your own.

What are you waiting for? This home is one of the best New York City has to offer.

Price advertised is net effective.
*Incentives being offered for July lease start with 12 & 24-month lease terms. ( unit PH819)

Email: Yotam @ hcony. com

entry.title: $2660 // Luxury Building Below Market Value! (Income & asset caps)
entry.content:
New construction! Be one of the original tenants!!
This set of buildings are LUXURY builds but fall into NYC M2 housing lotteries. The lotteries are over, so if you are reading this, it would be a smart move to contact me and apply right away. The process takes 3-4 weeks to go through.

Currently we have 1 and 2 bed units.

Here is the deal:
No Broker Fee. No Application Fee. No Guarantors. Rent Stabilized.
All units are income and asset restricted and all applicants MUST meet guidelines.
1 bed 1 person: $93K-$120K ($2,660 x month rent)
1 bed 2 people: - $93K - $137K combined ($2,660 x month rent)
2 bed 2 people (no couples, every room must be occupied, roommates must have lived together before): $93K - $137K ($3,206)
Asset value per household must not exceed $172K. This includes all personal property including brokerage accounts. 401K is excluded.
Applicants must no own real estate within 100 miles of NYC.


Each residence is filled with luxury fixtures and finishes. This is a TriBeCa building situated in Brooklyn.

Neighborhoods:
Right near Barclays Center. Full of restaurants, bars, a God-awful NBA team, shops, and all the trains. I live not too far away, and I am happy.

Apartment Features:
Hardwood Floors
Custom Cabinetry
Open layout with bay windows
Solid Stone Counter Top
Tile Back Splash
Microwave
Dishwasher
5 Burner Stove
Heat and Hot Water Included
Pre-Wired for Verizon Fios

Building includes:
Bike Room
Children's Playroom
Resident's Lounge
Outdoor Terrace
Laundry on each Floor
Pet Grooming
Fitness Center
Game Room
Yoga Studio

If you meet these requirements, contact me!! If you don't, still contact me as I have other stuff around downtown, Prospect Heights, Clinton Hill, Borum Hill, Williamsburg etc..!

Serious Inquires please
Shoot me an email or text me.

Bob
